import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent { isMenuOpen = false; toggleMenu(): void { this.isMenuOpen = !this.isMenuOpen; } }
